data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A clean, different way of representing XML in Perl. Uses native
    Perl data structures so that there is less to learn. All is done for
    you once calling the one function. Thus, it is XiMpLe.

    No new rootlevel namespace needed. Just think this should be listed
    for other people to use.
